name: part_000
file: tmp_≪DREAMCATCHER 3D LIVE≫ Hakos Baelz Birthday Celebration 2024! #BaeDay2024 [TQSikoeVXoE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Title card for "DREAM CATCHER Hakos Baelz Birthday Live 2024" with a countdown to the start of the live performance.
Animated segment titled "A BEGINNING" depicting the backstory of Hakos Baelz as a little rat with dreams of singing and dancing.
Transition to the live concert stage with elaborate visual effects featuring fire, waterfalls, and a large dice emblem.
Hakos Baelz performs the song "Odori" (踊) on a high-energy stage with backup dancers.

subtitles.original:
DREAM CATCHER
Hakos Baelz Birthday Live 2024
subtitles.english:
DREAM CATCHER
Hakos Baelz Birthday Live 2024

subtitles.original: A BEGINNING
subtitles.english: A BEGINNING

subtitles.original: There was once a little rat that dreamed.
subtitles.english: There was once a little rat that dreamed.

subtitles.original: She dreamed of a life filled with her loves:
subtitles.english: She dreamed of a life filled with her loves:

subtitles.original: singing, dancing, and anime.
subtitles.english: singing, dancing, and anime.

subtitles.original: Bae! Dinner time!
subtitles.english: Bae! Dinner time!

subtitles.original: Oh!
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: 半端なら K.O.
subtitles.english: If you're half-hearted, you're K.O.

subtitles.original: ふわふわしたいなら DANZA
subtitles.english: If you want to feel light, then dance!

subtitles.original: 火炎準備さあ O.K.
subtitles.english: Ready the flames, okay?

subtitles.original: 泣いても笑っても愛してね
subtitles.english: Whether I cry or laugh, love me, all right?

subtitles.original: 踊 / Lyrics: DECO*27 / Composition: Giga / TeddyLoid
subtitles.english: Odori / Lyrics: DECO*27 / Composition: Giga / TeddyLoid

subtitles.original: ほら SEINO 手を響かせろ
subtitles.english: Come on, one-two! Clap your hands!

subtitles.original: 難解となってつまんない 事もあるでしょう
subtitles.english: I'm sure there are times when things get complicated and boring.

subtitles.original: ロンリー・ロンリーなの？ 案外本気出そう
subtitles.english: Are you lonely-lonely? Let's get surprisingly serious.

subtitles.original: 嫌んなっちゃって泥に 吐くほどだろうが
subtitles.english: Even if you're sick of it and vomit in the mud,

subtitles.original: 溺れ堕ちてゆけ
subtitles.english: Go ahead and drown in it.

subtitles.original: それそれ行こうか
subtitles.english: Come on, let's go!

subtitles.original: もっと頑張って 渇望にもっと頑張って
subtitles.english: Try harder, try harder for your cravings!

subtitles.original: 繋がるわ 一人より二人 増えたら安心 心配ないや
subtitles.english:
We're connected; two is better than one.
More people means peace of mind, no worries!

subtitles.original: All right 任せてどんまい 甘い甘いな みんなで乗っかっちゃえば
subtitles.english:
All right, leave it to me, don't mind.
How sweet, if we all jump on together...

subtitles.original: ほら案外 スパッとイッちゃいそう
subtitles.english: Look, it'll probably go smoothly!

subtitles.original: 半端なら K.O.
subtitles.english: If you're half-hearted, you're K.O.

subtitles.original: ふわふわしたいなら DANZA
subtitles.english: If you want to feel light, then dance!

subtitles.original: 火炎準備さあ O.K.
subtitles.english: Ready the flames, okay?

subtitles.original: 泣いても笑っても愛してね
subtitles.english: Whether I cry or laugh, love me, all right?

subtitles.original: ほら SEINO 手を響かせろ
subtitles.english: Come on, one-two! Clap your hands!
